snippet.title: RoboSquare Early Access Trailer | Wishlist on Steam
snippet.description:
Want to have this much fun? Wishlist RoboSquare on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1427760/RoboSquare/

Testimonials at the beginning of the video:
Nortodo: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/831812120
PlentyAZach: https://youtu.be/pTdnWkS51Us

Fizzostia Social Media:
Discord: https://discord.gg/ZtbW2kysxM
Twitter: https://twitter.com/fizzostia
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Fizzostia/

Game Description:
Jump into speedy hazard-packed robo battles with up to 15 other players where random series of synchronized events destroy the fighting arena. Everyone zooms around the level bumping, drifting, and flipping to become the ultimate winner by being the last one to standing in an ongoing stage of madness. Join a sumo-inspired experience with a rush of energetic motor buzz where even the hardest hits and coolest tricks might not save you from the mayhem on the screen.

There is no lack of insane collisions in RoboSquare! From a massive pile-up at the start of a sumo match to crazy 1v1 controlled clashes, the gameplay is nothing short of electronic warfare. Grow your momentum and deliver that deafening blow to anyone standing in your way.

See more on the Steam store page!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1427760/RoboSquare/
